name: Blood, Cuts and Metal
description:
in Blood cuts kill you play as a little robot killing zombies with explosive results!

WASD to move and Mouse to Aim
press E to press up weapons in the current Weapon Slot
Mouse 1 to shoot
if you see a AmmoPack(often depicted as shotgun shells, riffle Ammo) you need to walk right up to it too pick it up
if you try you need to restart the page sense i didn't have enough time to make a death animation

Enjoy this short game!
